IN THE KITCHEN, Billy-Boy, Kittle and Nena sprawl through the doorway.  BULLETS RICOCHET.  Cupboards are blown open
Billy-Boy, Nena and Kittle tumble out the back door. They scramble towards the Torino.

Villains keep up the assault.  The Torino appears from around the side of the house, ZOOMING down the drive... Villains redirect their fire.  The Torino hits the street Heading away.  Poe shouts orders as he and his fellow assassins run to their vehicles.
Here comes the Torino, full out.... BEHIND: two Cadillacs followed by the Mustang.
Billy-Boy's loading a pump shotgun, muttering angrily...
Destroy a man's Steelers shrine. That's a declaration of war!
Billy-Boy turns to peer out back.
Okay, we got... one, two... three... (up to Kittle) Two Caddies and Poe's Mustang.
Could be worse.  I don't know how, but I'm sure it could.
Nena sits backwards in her seat, on her knees, fastens he seatbelt.  She leans out her window, FIRING...

Mickey shifts lanes as his windshield sprouts BULLET HOLE Poe's Mustang pulls ahead of the Cadillacs.  Thug-Two lea out the passenger window and FIRES a MACHINE GUN... BULLETS STRIKE the Torino's ass.  REAR WINDOW SHATTERS.
Kittle hunkers down.  Nena reloads.  Billy-Boy's horizont
(to Billy-Boy) You plan on shooting that gun or just hugging it?
I'm waiting till the time's right.
Well, sometime before we're all dead would be nice, if it's not too much fucking trouble, yellow-belly!
In the Mustang, Thug-Two withdrawals to reload. Billy-Boy pops up in the Torino's rear window, BLASTING.. The Mustang's right HEADLIGHT FRAGMENTS.
Billy-Boy PUMPS the shotgun, targeting...
He's too far back.
Kittle looks in the rearview, hits brakes...
The Torino slows, bringing the Mustang closer...
Thank you...
Billy-Boy FIRES... Poe and Thug-Two duck as their HOOD is BLOWN CLEAN OFF...
Yoo-hoo!  Flipped his lid!
The hood spins in the air... bounces off Balls' Cadillac.
Poe curses, downshifting, exposed ENGINE WHINING...
The Mustang falls back.  Mickey's Cadillac comes to the Torino's driver side... BASHING... SLAMMING... Billy-Boy FIRES out the side window... CRACKS Mickey's windshield, but Mickey keeps RAMMING.
The chase roars past. IN THE OPPOSITE LANE, a police squad car passes...
Officers Steve and Jim crane their necks, looking back.
You see that?
Sure as shit I did.
Officer Jim spins the wheel...
The squad car jumps the divider, u-turning.
The Torino and Mickey's Cadillac keep slamming. They separate to get around a slow truck, then... SLAM back together. BEHIND: GUNFIRE from Balls' Caddie...
Kittle flinches as a BULLET DESTROYS his REARVIEW MIRROR.
This is completely, Goddamn unacceptable!
Kittle accelerates as Billy-B and Nena return fire.  The Torino moves left, cutting in front of Mickey's Cadillac.
Kittle looks to Nena, who's reloading again.
Get his attention.
(raises and cocks guns) Your wish is my command.

The Torino brakes, keeping left, which brings Mickey's Cadillac along Nena's side as Nena OPENS FIRE... Mickey ducks as his WINDOW IMPLODES... Kittle jams the steering wheel right... FORCING Mickey's Cadillac over, toward sidewalk...
(thru clenched teeth) This one's for McDoogle's kid!!
Mickey's Cadillac COLLIDES with parked cars -- lifting impossibly, airborne, spinning sideways. CRASHING an abandoned STOREFRONT as citizens flee!
(looking back) Bye-bye bad guy!
Back at the storefront, Mickey's Cadillac BURSTS INTO FLA Debris flies.  And then, as one might expect, Mickey leap out from fire, BURNING FROM HEAD TO TOE, running in circl flapping his arms!
AT THE MOUTH OF A TUNNEL, the Torino soars out, heading downhill to mid-city streets. The Mustang and Balls' Cadillac follow... The squad car tails, still in the running.
A SIREN is HEARD behind.  Kittle glances back, happy...
Hey-Ho... !  Maybe we're not alone in this thing after all.
(lifts sunglasses, squints back) Who is that... ?
In Balls' Cadillac, Thug-One SHOOTS at the squad car as i passes.  Officer Steve returns fire. Then, the squad car overtakes Poe's Mustang.  Officer Ste SHOOTS at Poe.  The Mustang swerves away.
Far out, man!  Get those bastards!
Billy-Boy gives a thumbs-up, smiling...
Fucking hot-dogging vice pricks. Let's see how hot you are now... !
Officer Steve levels his pistol at the Torino...
The smile is wiped off Biliy-Boy's face as Officer Steve FIRES at him repeatedly.  Our heroes duck and cringe...
The Torino takes a sharp turn, gaining breathing room.
What the hell's his problem?
You mean, besides the warrant out on us for blowing up our commanding officer?
Billy-Boy rise's with his "Steelers" helmet on, peers bac recognizing the officers behind...
Remember those two uniform cops who been giving us such a hard time... ?
Yeah.
The ones you got in that fist-fight with a couple a weeks ago... ?
Yeah.
That's them trying to kill us.
Well, they sure know how to hold a grudge.
The Torino makes another shrill turn... Past a "WRONG WAY" sign, up a "ONE WAY" street...
THRU THE WINDSHIELD: lots of cars heading this way.
Interesting choice.
Kittle lays on the horn, steering...

Chaos.  The Torino weaves thru traffic.  HORNS BLARE. Cars SMASH each other to avoid head-on collisions... Behind, the patrol car slows, breaking away, choosing another route.  But, the Mustang follows the Torino... Side-swiping other vehicles, SCRAPING past, RAGING FORWAR Behind, Balls' Cadillac RAMS cars aside... Takes the path of least resistance: sidewalk... PLOWING THRU clothing racks and tables of a "SIDEWALK SAL The Cadillac clips tall SCAFFOLDING on its way back to th street.  The scaffolding lets out a CREAKING GROAN... Scaffolding falls... In the street, drivers inspecting their crashed cars must now to run for their lives as scaffolding CRASHES DOWN. Above, WORKMEN hang from windowsills, screaming.

head_text.subj: AT THE END OF THE BLOCK

text: The Torino hits open street, blasting forward. Congestion ahead, so the Torino cuts across sidewalk BOUNCING up a wide, marble staircase...

A FOLK SINGER plays guitar and sings about "peace, love a happiness" for an audience gathered around a fountain.  M others are picnicking on blankets nearby. The Torino ROARS as it reaches the top of the stairs... Heading straight for the crowd... Pigeons take flight.  People shriek and flee.  Many are knocked into the fountain.  The Torino cruises thru. Behind, the Mustang and Cadillac follow..
The Torino RUMBLES down another staircase.

FOLLOW as the Torimo arrives, spinning out, moving on... RIPPING PAST cross streets... Gaining some distance on the Mustang and Caddie. Behind, the sguad car turns off one cross street, fishtailing to rejoin the chase.
Kittle takes the Torino down a long block...
(daunted) Okay... it just got worse...
THRU WINDSHIELD: busy CONSTRUCTION SITE.

The Torino races by signs: "LANE ENDS" and "ONE LANE AHEA The Torino halts at the rear of a long line of cars, ENGI SNORTING.  Up front, a yawning FLAGMAN holds a "STOP" sig Kittle sticks his head out, looking... Construction vehicles and a huge mound of dirt block the right lane.  Opposing traffic's coming thru on the left. Kittle sweats.  He looks back... Here they come: Mustang... Cadillac... squad car...
Billy-Boy aims his shotgun out back.
Whatever we're gonna do, we should do it now.
Kittle shifts, reverse, heading backwards...
Um... wrong way.  See, the bad men are back there, and we want to go away from them!
The Torino angles, stops, then heads forward, squeaking p the long line of cars... PICKING UP SPEED...
AHEAD: the mound of dirt... WHIP PAN: to Nena, who realizes, looking to Kittle, who i intensely goal-focused, in a zone.
You're... you're not doing what I think you're doing... ?
Seatbelts fastened, please.
Billy-Boy faces front, confused...
Even if we make it.. which we won't... we don't know what's on the other side!
Billy-Boy figures it out...
Oh, no... no, no, no!!
ENGINE'S HUMMING.  Nena braces her feet on the dash, head between her knees.  Billy-Boy sees this, dizzy with fear.

(trying to be calm) Look, Kittle... pull over and let me out.  I'll be fine... okay?  How 'bout that... ? (absolutely freaking) Oh, Lord almighty, listen to me... I don't want to die!!  Lemme out of this coffin!!
Clench your teeth.
Wh... what... ?!
Clench your teeth so when we land you don't accidentally bite off your tongue.
Billy-Boy lets out a weak whimper, sits back, gripping ceiling straps and closing his eyes.
Construction workers dive for safety. The Torino hits the dirt mound, riding up.... Taking flight... High above... Lands with a WHOOMP!, throwing dust, rocketing onward...
Kittle gives a HOOT of joy.  Nena plants a kiss on him. back, Billy-Boy half-giggles/half-cries, giddy.
The Mustang ZOOMS off the dirt ramp... flying... Followed by Balls' Cadillac... skyward... They both land upright, surviving...
The squad car FLIES over the dirt mound... soaring... Something's wrong.  Off balance, slowly flipping... BOOOOOOOM! -- lands flat on its roof, pancaked!

A narrow spillway.  At the top, the Torino BASHES thru a chain-link gate, heading down... Into the far-as-the-eye-can-see expanses of the concrete Los Angeles River.  The Torino picks up the pace, riding sloped wall. LONG-SHOT AERIAL VIEW: as the Mustang and Cadillac shadow the Torino.  Straightaway.  SPEEDS BECOME EXCESSIVE...
Nena cranks a handle above, opening a SUNROOF.
Nena stands up thru the sunroof, aiming two guns back... Behind, Poe slows, letting Balls' Cadillac take the lead. Thug-One leans out, FIRING a MACHINE GUN... Nena shoots, DOUBLE BLASTING...
Thug-One's gun empties.  He leans in to reload.  He doesn notice yet: Balls is a gory, bullet-ridden mess beside hi slumped against the steering wheel.
Bitch can't hit a thing.
Thug-One finishes loading, lets out a nervous laugh, glan at Balls' corpse... does a double-take... Thug-One looks forward, opening his mouth to scream...

The Cadillac EXPLODES as it SLAMS a bridge abutment dead center.  Sounds like a THUNDER-CLAP.  HUGE FIREBALL... The Mustang bursts thru the flame, unrelenting... Kittle takes the Torino down off the wall... KNIFING thru shallow water... Up the opposite wall... The Mustang follows suit with Thug-Two SHOOTING...
Chain link fence borders the L.A. River.  A golf cart putters past.  The Torino and Mustang BUST up and out thr the fence, taking off across the golf course...

On the tee, an elderly GENTLEMAN GOLFER, in plaid knicker and a pom-pom cap, tees off.  Good hit... He watches his ball go, squinting.  Far off, down the fairway, the Torino and Mustang cross the lush, rolling hills, EXCHANGING GUNFIRE...
The golf ball bounces off the hood of the Torino.
Gentleman Golfer watches the cars pass.  GUNSHOTS ECHO.
That's peculiar. (long pause, to caddie) Winter rules, I suppose.

The Torino and Mustang clash, BUMPING each other... JOSTLING for position.  Really moving... The Torino heads downhill, swerving... BASHING the Mustan guiding it... towards a SAND TRAP... Poe realizes too late, crying out... The Mustang hits the sand trap, WHEELS WHINING, SPINNING THROWING SAND high in the air.  Immediately immobile. Poe pounds the wheel in frustration, going ape-shit. The Torino continues...
The Torino BURSTS out from a line of thick shrubbery, ont semi-busy street, joins the flow of traffic.

Big party.  Loud.  Party-goers move in the trippy flicker STROBE LIGHTS, drinking and drugging.  Kittle, Nena and Billy-Boy arrive, scanning.. In the middle of the' crowd, there's a NUDE WOMAN in only mink coat standing on top a piano, writhing and laughing hysterically for no reason, non-stop; laughing and laughi and laughing, though we can't hear her over the din. Half the room's taken up by a makeshift indoor volleyball court, where men and women play NAKED VOLLEYBALL.  These aren't all "beautiful people" either.  There's plenty of middle-aged men and women who should have kept clothes on
That's sick.
Welcome to Beverly Hills. Wife-swapping Capital of the World.
Kittle leads the way.  A big, NAKED BODY-BUILDER comes to block their path.  Kittle grimaces, afraid to look down.
'Scuse me, fella... I need to see your invitations.
Or what?  You gonna hit us over the head with your penis?
Body-Builder grips Kittle.  Nena and Billy-B brandish gun
Take your baby-lotioned hands off him, Zeus.  Good.  Now, come here...
Nena leads Naked Body-Builder with her gun to his neck.
You're gonna tell us where Archie the accountant is.  But first...
She takes out HANDCUFFS, snaps one cuff around a doorknob and secures it, then holds up the other cuff.
Try to guess which part of your body's going in here.

MUSIC THROBS.  People dance, drenched, STROBE-LIT.  Bad fashion choices.  They're really shaking their bootie, banging asses together, grabbing and gyrating, oversexed. Kittle, Nena and Billy-B shove thru this jumble, moving o

On the porch, surrounded by coke mirrors and bowls of R,W pills, three nubile YOUNG WOMEN sit in the frothing HOT T drinking champagne and giggling. Then, ARCHIE, a middle-aged, hairy-chested sleaze-ball in gold chains, pops up from under the water, laughing...
Now, that's what I call diving for --
He's YANKED out of the hot tub by the chains around his neck, ending that sentence with a guttural CHOKE.
Archie's shoved into the garage, catches himself against red Trans-Am, wet and vulnerable in his bathing suit.  He turns to face Kittle, Nena and Billy-Boy.
This is private property.  This is breaking and entering!
Just entering.  We'll get to the breaking in a minute.
Archie's shifty, crosses his arms to cover nipples.
Whatever you fuzz are sniffing for, I don't have it.  You came to the wrong place.
Kittle throws the ledger book and Archie catches it.

You're Zimmermann's calculator, Archie.  All the blood money you had to move around to make this deal, you got to know something.  Maybe they told you, maybe you overheard things you weren't supposed to hear...
I'm telling you, you're barking up the wrong tree.
(furious) Well, I'm running out of trees, so look me in the eye like a man and tell me you don't know!  Convince me!
(flinching, miserable) I don't know.  Fuck off!
(studies Archie) You suck at lying, Archie.
See... now that we know you know, the hard part's done for us.
It's just a question of how long do we have to slap you silly till you spill the beans.
If this deal goes smooth, I clear three hundred fifty grand.  That's enough for three more houses like this.  And, what are you offering me instead, other than a black eye and a fat lip?
Kittle motions.  Billy-Boy steps up, puts Archie in a cho
Yeah... there, just like that... (submits) Okay, go ahead.  But first take a good look around at how I'm living, and then think about your own shitty lives...
Kittle pushes Billy-Boy aside, GUT-PUNCHES Archie.  Archi gasping.  Billy-Boy PUNCHES him, sends him sprawling.

(catching breath) I know the drill.  Maybe I can't stop you from beating on me... but, I'll heal up.  It doesn't change the fact that cops eat hamburgers and hot dogs while crooks eat lobster and caviar.
Kittle KICKS.  Archie rolls.  Kittle comes to lift Archie by gold chains, ready to punch again...
(weary, resigned) It's not even like there's a choice to be made, so... do whatever you feel like you have to do.
Kittle's unsure.  He drops Archie, frustrated, leaving.
Kittle leads the way back across the volleyball room, ang pushing stoned guests.  Billy-Boy lights up a cigarette.
We're screwed.
I'm well aware of that.
What's the plan?
Beats me.  You got a suggestion, feel free to shout it out, genius.

Kittle glances up, stops.  He's focused above, loathing.. ABOVE, on a balcony overlooking the party, ADAM, a gaunt, glassy-eyed blonde junkie in head-to-toe leather, smiles down.  He crooks his finger slyly; "come here."
Our three heroes follow Adam in, wary.  Dim room.  Candle Adam sinks into a couch, puts his arm around EVE, a blond misfit-addict also slathered in leather.
(disgust, anger) Adam and Eve.  Never one without the other.
Eve's fixing, shooting heroin... ZOOM-IN CLOSE-UP: on the needle piercing Eve's arm. Nena's riveted by this, instantly queasy, averts her eyes
That's our names, don't wear'em out.

Eve laughs, so stoned.  She puts the needle aside.  Adam gropes her face and they flick tongues together. Billy-Boy puts a hand on Nena's shoulder.  Nena gives him look to say she's okay, wiping sweat off her upper lip.
(to Eve, lovingly) Indivisible and inseparable.
Incestuous.
Every person's got their own kinks, beef-cake. (stands, slinks forward) What's wrong, Kittle?  You don't swing?
Adam rises to lavish attention, touching.  Kittle stews.
What Eve and I wouldn't give to meet up with you on the business end of a daisy chain.
(shoves Adam off) Put up your kickstand, freak.  Start talking, or we're out the door.
A little birdie whispered in my ear today... about the needle-candy you're chasing.  It's up here... (taps his forehead) ... in the old curiosity shop.
Kittle looks questioningly to Nena and Billy-Boy, doubtfu
How much?
I figure, for this information, the usual payment... times ten.
You think it's that good?
I'll tell you what... I think it's all you've got.

(false smile) Well... what can I do?  You've created a dilemma... (looks at watch) And, look at the that. Time's running out.  I wonder... how can I impress upon you just exactly how frustrating this situation is for me?

Billy-Boy dutifully drops his cigarette, steps it out.  H grabs Adam and throws him across the room... Adam SMASHES a dresser and tumbles to the floor, smugness immediately replaced by shock and fear.
Bastards... !
Eve gets up, falls down, crawls to cradle Adam.
You get nothing and like it.  And if we're not blissfully happy with what you tell us, we arrest you just for the fun of it.
Okay, man, okay.  I'm with you.  I... I heard how the shit's arriving... (leans forward, whispers) It's coming in a Lincoln.
Kittle's waiting for more.  There ain't more.
And... ?
What and?  That's what I got.
A Lincoln?  What Lincoln?  Lincoln Continental?  Lincoln Mark Five... Six... ?
Now you know what to watch for...
Am I supposed to take this information and sit up in the hills with a frickin' telescope?
This much powder you don't throw in the trunk with a blanket over it. It's got to be smuggled.
There's not even enough places to stash it in a car.
Have I ever steered you wrong?
(pissed, to Billy-Boy) Cuff'em.  Let's see what these two love birds say once they're sitting in separate cages.
Billy-Boy pulls Eve off Adam, handcuffs her roughly as sh kicks and protests.  Adam grabs at her, scared.
Get off her, monster!  Leave her alone... !
Billy-Boy shoves Adam.  Nena restrains Adam, cuffing him.

(to Billy-Boy) Take her down to the car, and for Christ's sake be careful this time. (to Adam) Last suspect he took in, butter-fingers dropped her down the stairs.  What a mess.  Why is it we don't appreciate our arms and legs till we've lost the use of them?
(desperation rising) Hey, listen... I'll give you something else, Kittle.  Anything. Remember... remember that corpse washed up on Huntington Beach?  It was never identified...
Who cares?
Alright, wait... there's a dentist in Brentwood peddling morphine...
(ignores, to Billy-B) Careful she doesn't hit her head on the way.
Billy-Boy drags Eve towards the door.
Come on, don't you screw with her, please!  You... you got to want this: armored car job.  CalTrust Bank. They took two million in cash...
Read my lips: Zimmermann or nothing.
Hold up a minute, Kittle.
Nena drops Adam, motions for Kittle to follow her.  They huddle.  Nena whispers. Billy-B waits in the doorway with Eve, lights a cigarette Kittle nods to Nena, then returns to Adam.
We'll take the CalTrust heist, but if it's no good, we will hunt you down, and Billy-Boy will pull out your spine and he will beat you to death with it.
(relieved) Fair enough.

A dirty window.  Kittle's face appears outside, peeking i thru grime.  He ducks away.  CAMERA MOVES... REVEALS an ARMORED CAR in the middle of the vast warehouse... and, away from the truck, SIX BANK ROBBERS, unwashed, frightening tough-guys, play poker, drink and smoke... and, nearby, a SUITCASE full of cash.  $2 millio
Empty streets like a ghost town.  Late in the day.  The sun's low.  Kittle hurries back to the parked Torino.
They're there, laying low.  It's Allison and Hinchberger's crew. Lunatics, every one of 'em.

Nena and Billy-Boy have duffel bags of guns on their laps sorting and trading bullets, loading every gun.  Kittle picks up his own bag, following suit. For a while, that's the only sound, of guns checked and loaded.  In back, Billy-Boy takes a deep swallow from his flask.  Kittle turns his head, seeing this, faces front.
(to Billy-Boy) When you planning to cut back on that?
What?
The booze.
I don't know.  I could quit now if I wanted, I just don't want to.
(skeptical) Sure you could.
Billy-Boy studies his reflection in the flask, buzzed, sa
I don't know what the problem is. Plenty of great men throughout history got their bravery out of a bottle
Name one.
Dean Martin.
Entertainers don't count.
All the time, they're still occupied loading guns.
What about Jack Daniels?  Wasn't he a decorated general in the Civil War?
No.
General Jim Beam, then.
Nope.
Oh.  Well.   I think it's pretty common knowledge that in the Battle of Little Big Horn, Custer was drunk off his ass.
Who's been giving you history lessons?  Your bartender?
Okay, seriously.  What about Napoleon, huh?
What about him?
You've never heard of Napoleon brandy, Mister Smarty-Pants?  How do you think it got its name?
Billy, I love you I really do... but I've got to tell you, every day, in every way, you give new meaning to the word "stupidity."
(long pause) What can I say to that... except, I love you too, you mean-spirited bitch.

In front, Nena allows a thin smile, still loading.  Kittl turns ON the RADIO: "Beth" by Kiss. Kittle switches: "Midnight at the Oasis," "Fly, Robin, Fl by Silver Connection.  "The Night Chicago Died."  "Cats i the Cradle" by Harry Chapin.  "Da Doo Ron Ron" by Shaun Cassidy.   "Mr. Jaws."  "Billy Don't Be a Hero."  "Angie Baby."  Theme from t.v.'s "Happy Days."  "Nadia's Theme."
(to Nena, calm) Excuse me...
Kittle moves over, angling his body and lifting his heel he can KICK the radio -- SMASHING the radio into SILENCE. Kittle sits back down and calmly continues loading.

Big warehouse doors.  The Torino CRASHES thru! Across the warehouse, robbers leap to their weapons, runn for cover behind big wooden crates and industrial drums. The Torino skids to stop, sideways... Kittle, Nena and Billy-Boy, wearing NYLONS stretched over their heads, jump out with duffel bags, taking cover behi the car.  Bullets THUNK against the Torino. Kittle's got got a BULLHORN, shouting into it.
(thru bullhorn) ... This is the police.  We don't want trouble... just come out with your hands up...
The bank robbers peer out occasionally, FIRING sporadical
(thru bullhorn) Put down your weapons and surrender. I'm not kidding... this is your last chance.  Stop trying to kill us', or we will be forced to return fire...

Robbers curse them, keeping up their uneven attack. BEHIND THE BARRELS, Several robbers are reloading, not to quick, dropping bullets in their haste. BEHIND THE TORINO, Kittle gives Nena and Billy-Boy a look and a shrug.  He tosses the bullhorn aside... Kittle, Nena and Billy-Boy open duffel bags in front of then, choosing guns, rising... FIRING, six guns in all, one per hand... Wooden crates splinter.  Holes burst in metal drums. Several robbers are hit, bloodied. Our heroes keep BLASTING.  As soon as a gun empties, it's thrown aside in favor of another from a duffel bag, facilitating NON-STOP FIRING... One robber rises up, FIRING.  He's hit, falling, bloody. Poker chips and cards are sent flying... BULLETS are HEARD RICOCHETING everywhere, throwing sparks Bank robbers are overwhelmed, hardly able to get in a sho GUNSHOTS are DEAFENING as Kittle, Nena and Billy-Boy continue SHOOTING.  Gunsmoke grows thick and empty guns p up at their feet. One robber makes a run for an exit door, but he gets shot down on the way, falling, screaming. Kittle, Nena and Billy-Boy stop firing.  GUNSHOTS ECHO.
(pause, shouting) If anybody's still alive over there... now would be a good time for you to run away.
A pause.  Two remaining robbers run, reaching an exit doo and escaping, not looking back.
Archie's house.  Archie's in the shower.  PHONE'S RINGING Archie gets a towel, answers the nearby phone.
(into phone) Yeah? (listens, impatient) I got nothing to say to you... huh? How's that... (interest piqued) I'm listening.
CAMERA MOVES: to the ajar door.  Someone's there...

A REDHEAD, one of the hot tub bikini girls, stands eavesdropping.  She crosses... Carefully picks up a phone, listening. (from phone) This is something you should seriously consider.  What do you say? (pause, from phone) Meet me on Mulholland.  Above Outpost Drive...
Party MUSIC's still THROBBING elsewhere.  The Redhead mov thru waning weirdoes, reaches a phone, dialing.
(waits for answer, whispers in phone) Hello?  Yeah... I need to talk to Mister Zimmermann.
Kittle opens the SUITCASE filled with $2 million dollars.
It's all yours.
Archie tries not to let his excitement show, but he's awe It's twilight.  They're on the road's narrow shoulder wit the city beginning to sparkle behind.  Cars parked nearby
You could start over again with cash like that.
Go wherever you want.  Live how you want.
No more counting the big money for someone else.
Beholden to none.
Archie's conflicted.  He touches the money, hands trembli
(looks at watch) It's six o'clock.  Time's runaing out.  Decide.
If I tell you, how do I know you won't just club me and take it back?

You don't.  It's a gamble.  But, not even in Vegas are you gonna get close to this kind of cash. (emphasizing) This is two million, Archie.  It's not three houses, it's twelve.  It's dreams come true.
Archie's tempted, fearful.
(whispers) Risk it.
Archie stares at the money, trance-like.  Then, quietly:
It just got here.  Like you said, it took about a week from New York...
Kittle, Billy-Boy and Nena share looks, can't believe.
(long pause) Three hundred kilos of White Lady hidden inside a giant bust of Abraham Lincoln.  A parade float.
What... ?
(looks to Kittle) Abe Lincoln...
Coming down the road, hauled by a R,W+B pick-up truck: a giant ABE LINCOLN HEAD parade float, tacky and crude. It's gonna be in the Bicentennial parade on Wilshire tonight.
The float whizzes past.
You see how perfect it is?  It's the fucking Trojan "horse," man.  Nobody suspects a thing...

In a small town square, country folk gather to look at th Lincoln float and have pictures taken with it. A gift from one city to another, but who's gonna ask who's giving the gift?  It's a great, big, paper-and-glue goodwill ambassador, stopping along the way to promote American values.
Thugs load the lobotomized Abe float with BAGS of HEROIN. Nobody imagines what's inside.  No cops are gonna search it, cause what's to search?  It's not a car. It's not a truck.  It's Abe Lincoln.

All Zimmermann has to do is sit back at his party tonight and wait till the parade's done.  The floats go to some warehouse afterwards, where there's no guards cause it's all garbage in the morning anyhow.  So, while the city sleeps, Zimmermann's guys show up and empty it out. (smiles) It's that simple.

GUNFIRE O.S.!  Bullets hit Archie... Kittle, Nena and Billy-Boy turn, reaching for guns... Poe and TWO KILLERS stand on the road, FIRING...
